:. install .:

1.: unrar with the latest winrar (3.62 or higher) or use 7zip!.
2.: double click on &#039; Set-Game.exe &#039; (must be done).
3.: double click on &#039; RollCage.exe&#039; to start the game!.


<> Happy Gaming  <>





S p e c i a l   I n f o   N o t e :

Some virus-scanner recognize the header of packed exe&#039;s ( Set-Game.exe )

as a lame virus, (coz it&#039;s the mostly byte by byte check error of  em!.)
